name: Jump Jam!
description:
HARDEST GAME EVER!!

How far can you go?

- Tons of awesome characters to unlock!
- Super hard!
- 80+ unique, challenging levels! How far can you go?
- Simple one-touch gameplay anyone can pick up!
- Race through each level with the fastest time!
- Can you get all 3 stars?
- Supports 13 languages!

PLEASE NOTE:

Jump Jam! is completely free to play. However, some items can be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your devices settings.

Jump Jam! was developed by PlaySide, the developers behind Editors’ Choice title “Catch The Ark”, Icy Ropes, Monkey Ropes, The Lego Batman Movie Game, Bouncy Bits and more.

Let us know what you would love to see in our next update at : www.playsidestudios.com
